original_text: Now Joshua circumcised their sons, who had taken their place. Their fathers had not circumcised them while they travelled in the desert.
korean_text: 그들의 대를 잇게 하신 이 자손에게 여호수아가 할례를 행하였으니 길에서는 그들에게 할례를 행하지 못하였으므로 할례 없는 자가 되었음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Their fathers had not circumcised them
while they travelled in the desert
